With the ZS20 you don't have to change settings for macro and the 20x optical zoom is awesome. As good as if not better than my brother's $900 Nikkon. Highly underrated!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dean "Dean Bjornson"
Reviews.Content: User friendly, quick recovery for next picture, easy look back, good zoom for a small camera and great pictures  -  what more can you ask for an amateur family photographer?

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20...love it!
Reviews.Author: Tara Lyn
Reviews.Content: I have a DSLR Nikon  and love it but its just too bulky to use all the time... I purchased Panasonic or size, quality, video...I am so happy with the quality- its a great little camera! Had an issue with video- as soon as i figured it out and realized how easy it is to use I am thrilled! I would highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera
Reviews.Author: @vicsamiga
Reviews.Content: Looking for a fine simple point and shoot camera, with a very fine lens (Leica) With amaizing features. I bought this, and I am very happy with it. Simple and profetional. Great pictures in low light ambients without flash. Inceredible lcomposition.

Reviews.Title: 3rd time panasonic camera owner
Reviews.Author: Simply Hines "weigh loss in CA"
Reviews.Content: I have been using my camera and taking some really nice pics. Although I am still learning the camera I like that it is so easy to use when I take pics at near or far distances. My only complaint is I could not load the 8.1PE software so I had to rely on the previous 8.0 version. The first time I loaded on the pics there was no problem. Recently I tried to load pics from my church's Easter production and it kept stopping after copying some of the pics to my computer. I had to make 3 different files to get all the pics loaded on my computer. I could not determine if it was the camera or SDHC or the computer. I have not had this problem before with my computer or previous Panasonic camera.Overall, I like but my camera and would purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: lumix
Reviews.Author: Sabina Turbel
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera, lumix is always a great choice, the pictures are very nice, even if you are not an expert.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular for the price
Reviews.Author: Virginia Singer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a photo safari to Africa.  It was easy to use, allowed me to take "close-up" pictures of the animals - especially birds - from a great distance, and was easy to carry.  All in all, it was so much better than I expected for the price and I came home from Africa with spectacular pictures.Of course it does not provide SLR quality pictures, but it does provide very good quality pictures.  The largest I plan on viewing the pictures is on a computer screen.  Some of the pictures taken at 80x zoom are grainy, even on the computer screen, so would not be acceptable for enlargement or TV screen.  But for the pictures taken with a lower zoom, especially while still in the optical zoom range, there is no graininess on the computer screen.In summary, if you are like me and view your photos as memories, not art, and do not plan on doing 16x20 wall art - then this is a great camera.  If you want art and huge enlargements, stay with an SLR.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom
Reviews.Author: David R. Pickler
Reviews.Content: First rate zoom for the price. I have purchased half-a-dozen Lumix cameras before and they get consistently better. This is the best so far and look forward to newer versions ( as do my nieces who inherit my old models).

Reviews.Title: Paired with Marine Case
Reviews.Author: Phillip Phan
Reviews.Content: Worked like a charm. Took great pictures. The Underwater smart setting worked well. The flash synchronized with my strobe, although the built in flash with the new placement of the flash lens on the marine case was just as good (no backscatter).

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Donald Hanley
Reviews.Content: This is a great point n shoot camera.  It has lots of features topped off by the totally great Leica lens. . a GREAT camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice for Travelers
Reviews.Author: Clovis Rondon
Reviews.Content: I have 6 months with this camera since I bought it for Amazon, and I can give you guarantee that it is excellent quality and functionality. previously had a Kodak M1033 and i have no doubt in the sharpness of image,n voice quality during recording and of course duration of the battery that offers my new camera Panasonic. In addition to its extra features such as GPS and the location of the picture at the time of its capture pictures in 3D scenes which didn't try because I do not have the means to reproduce them

Reviews.Title: This camera rocks!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my trip to Rome because I felt like my phone wouldn't do such a beautiful city justice and I'm not disappointed one bit.I still haven't read all the advance settings but even on standard settings this camera takes great pictures. The 20x Zoom works like a dream without the distorted and blurriness you get with digital zoom. It's light, quick and the image quality is amazing. What more can you ask for? I also didn't think I'd like having GPS on my camera as much as I do. Made remembering the location when I reviewed my pictures a breeze.Get this camera!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic ZS20
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Desinger
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be more pleased with the Lumix ZS20.  Love the zoom!  Very straightforward and easy to handle.  Very clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20 14.1 MP High Sensitivity MOS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Har Wong
Reviews.Content: This is my second Lumix camera.And also my very satified one.I like it's size and it's light weight. Of course it's performance too.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PURCHASE!!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly C
Reviews.Content: Main purpose of this purchase was to have a small but nice camera to bring into concert to take photos/video.  This is a must have!  Absolutely impressed with it's performance.  Had nosebleed seats and the zoom feature is so amazing it's like you're in the front row!  High def video is excellent.  I felt this worked great, especially in the low light arena.  I would definitely recommend this camera, just for the digital zoom alone!!!Only recommendations would be to purchase additional batteries for the camera so you have them along with you as spares.  If taking a lot of photos/video, the battery does drain faster than a normal camera, but a simple battery switch out solves that.So glad I chose this camera!  Pictures and HD video are amazing!  Everyone I've showed since coming home from a concert was super impressed by it!

Reviews.Title: Terrific
Reviews.Author: William Knost
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a very reasonable price. The wife has not problem using this. She wanted an easy to use high quality point and shot with a good zoom. This hit the mark.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Claudio Caceres
Reviews.Content: The cam was just like New! With a box, manuals and all the eccessories. Really it is an Awsome camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: L. Anderson "swampside"
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple to use and the photos are fabulous.  All details of the order were effortless.  It arrived on time and was exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mr. Awesome
Reviews.Content: Great compact camera with all the features that I wanted. My only gripe is the GPS is weak and slow when trying to get a signal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Duzgun Aral
Reviews.Content: After researching and looking at every camera I decided this one had everything I needed. High megapixels and the best zoom. I wasn't wrong, this is the best out there.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: ryjack
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. I think this is a great all around camera for those who do not want or are not ready for a DSLR. No regrets so far. I didn't want/need the GPS but this was cheaper than the ZS19 on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Travis Nelson
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality.... Everything is perfect for the price.  I got this for my wife and she loves it. We are from the usa and currently living in Prague

Reviews.Title: very well designed!
Reviews.Author: Moises Burger
Reviews.Content: the best ratio size benefit. Very well designed! I felt no need for a larger sensor. it is enough to me.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Riega
Reviews.Content: It's a very simple and powerful camera with a great lense. Its a good option when you don't do the thing in manual mode.

Reviews.Title: not just another camera
Reviews.Author: Rouzbeh K. Kordestani
Reviews.Content: i have a few nikons D90s that i use.  but i needed something quick and light. so i looked around and found this camera.  when i bought it i didnt know what to expect.this is a great camera. good price. the pictures have proven to be very nice.

Reviews.Title: I am loving it
Reviews.Author: J. Leung
Reviews.Content: Great camera. My son belongs to the men's glee in college. I had great close up shots even though I was far away. The video I took is of great quality, clear both visual and audio. It has so many features and will take me a while to reach the full potential.

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Fred Schaff "flschaff"
Reviews.Content: Love it for size, capability including 20X ZOOM but dislike it has special battery which -- as far as what came with camera -- needs to be re-charged in the camera itself such that, separately, I bought a spare battery with charge kit.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Wieczorek
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this camera. It takes wonderful pictures and is easy to use. A high-quality product at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Jeanne
Reviews.Content: Big improvement over my previous generation (or two) camera. Photos with low light are coming out well. Most important for me: video clips have good sound and clear images (for recording music classes and lessons).

Reviews.Title: enjoyable to use
Reviews.Author: Les
Reviews.Content: Took this with me on a recent Pacific Ocean/ Hawaiian Island cruise and learned as we went -- an enjoyable outcome.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Sharky17
Reviews.Content: Got it as a replacement for and old lumix camera. It is a big bigger than my old one but the new features make up for it i.e. the GPS function and the massive zoom and anti shake all work really well.Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what I expected it to be. Very satisfied with the camera and its functions. I recommend to everyone

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Nikolay Grozdanov
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for a friend of mine who is photographer enthusiast. Before I gave it to him I tested the camera and I was really impressed. I have DSLR and usually shoot in manual mode since I am picky about the settings. This small camera has quite a bit features, plenty of modes (manual of course) that give the owner big set of shooting options, great zoom and all this in compact size for about $250.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Laslo "Laslo"
Reviews.Content: Had an older version of this camera with less pixels and that one was great. I still use it and this one was for my wife. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20 14.1 High Sensitivity MOS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Francis W. Chamberand
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife to replace a lost camera that she loved. Panasonic cameras are great cameras and are very easy to use. Point and shoot is what this camera is all about and it takes crisp, clean, clear pictures. I recommend Panasonic Cameras, TVs or any other Panasonic product to anyone at anytime. I own several Panasonic products and all of them perform wonderfully. Please join the Panasonic fan/owner club - you'll be glad you did!

Reviews.Title: The New Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Did not think I needed one.  But checked how old my last one was, 7years.  Got one of the best point and shoot cameras. The camera is faster to take a picture than other camera of its type with good general picture quality, and at a price of 270 dollars.I said ,"Make it so Number One." (Star Trek quote).  The quality of construction, software, and final picture is very good. I never knew 14mg pic. looked so good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera!
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: I searched for a long time for the perfect camera for my needs.  I wanted a small camera to use in my travels but I didn't want to comprise on the quality.  This camera did the trick.  I have never been this happen on a camera.  Every picture comes out perfect and the price was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I love this camera that I received for Christmas.  My only CON is that you can not clear blemishes as my KODAK camera could do; this camera should have that ability.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: MJO
Reviews.Content: It was ranked very highly by Cnet, and it lives up to the expectations.  Though I wouldn't get it if you're hung up on GPS filters--very difficult to acquire, having tried in Chicago or the rural areas.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: shelby
Reviews.Content: Have had a Lumix for several years and have used it LOTS.  It died on Christmas Eve....still takes pictures good but will no longer flash on any setting.  So ordered an updated version - very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Pierre Etienne Bizier
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera so far did not take many pictures with it but so far much better than my Cannon camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Richard Nelson
Reviews.Content: My second Lumix.  Unfortunately, I scatched the lens on my first one, a ZS1 that I bought a couple of years ago.  This new model has greater zoom capability and is lighter than the first.  Great picture quality.  Price comparable to first one too.

Reviews.Title: It's what you would expect from Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Eden
Reviews.Content: It's a good bang-for-buck value. Loaded with nice and useful features such as GPS tagging, this camera carries the traditional quality expected from a made-in-Japan product ( There are other lower end Panasonic cameras in the market that are made in China, and these cameras are very unreliable and failed prematurely).This model offers manual mode, which allow ther user to set shutter priority and other settings that would give more control of the shooting. The video mode offering HD video is a nice feature that makes your traveling a bit lighter. The construction is solid. The battery is exchagable with a large number of other Panasonic cameras of the same class.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: K. DeFoe "Kid"
Reviews.Content: Hubby did lots of research before he chose this and he has not been disappointed in the quality and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic pocket digital cameras have received great reviews.  I give it another thumbs up!
Reviews.Author: Doctor L
Reviews.Content: Over the years, I have purchased a few digital pocket cameras.  This is the best one yet.  It takes sharp and colorful pictures and video.  I have not used the GPS feature yet.  I will use it on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: Precious birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Roman A.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife, she says:"Received this as a gift. You cannot beat the price here. It takes about a day or two reading to really get the hang of it but you will not be sorry.  Considering how much this camera can do a day or two reading is nothing.  I am so glad to have it.Interface may be a little confusing for people who are not skilled with cameras so read the manual. It comes with Photo editing software I have played with a bit, seems easy enough to use for someone with moderate computer skills. You don't have to use the software to get the photos off the camera. A great bargain for a quality camera."

Reviews.Title: The perfect pocket camera
Reviews.Author: BABYDOC
Reviews.Content: I love this little guy.  I have a much larger Sony that might do more tricks, but this little guy fits a pocket and does everything you want to do.  Some reviewers seem hypercritical of the images, but I have had great pics, fast, good color, great zoom.  If you only have the cash for one camera, this one is it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dale Ternes
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Panasonic. Love it as much as first one that I got 6 years ago- different model of course.

Reviews.Title: Work Purchase
Reviews.Author: Dward
Reviews.Content: This is an item i purchased for work. I have not use them, but htey are being used widely here at work so i am guessing they are great . I have had no complanits at all.

Reviews.Title: This is the Camera I have been waiting for
Reviews.Author: Gene Badesheim
Reviews.Content: My background is as a former user of a 4x5 field camera, for desert landscape black and white work.  I am just returning to the photographic field and wanted a camera of extended capability but with the easy carry around and use as I re-imerse into this interest, minus the film developing and other darkroom activities.I am still learning to use most of it's advanced capabilities.  I friend of mine who is a superb photographer recommended this camera to me.  So far it has performed superbly in mostly autofocus and auto exposure modes.  I think the Lens resolution and zoom capabilities are quite good.  It appears to be a fine piece of machinery.  It even survived a dunking in the toiled (clean water) thank goodness.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice !!!
Reviews.Author: Alfonso Fuentes
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, light weigth, funtional, great zoom. Compact size is a good idea for travel an other occasions. Really good product...

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera
Reviews.Author: Julia Wulf
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time, without any damages. I love the camera. It takes really good pictures, the panorama shots are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Huge feature list for a point'n'shoot
Reviews.Author: J.R.
Reviews.Content: Lots of features and presets. It's easy to navigate the menus, make settings changes and save them to make custom presets. Excellent picture and video quality. Unless you're a pro and need interchangable lenses, this camera should do all you need.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Harold Fallon
Reviews.Content: Only limitation is using in dark surroundings. Easy to use, excellent photos. Light weight and easily accessible. I would recommend

Reviews.Title: It's The Shirt Pocket Camera I Wanted
Reviews.Author: William Johnson "BillJohnson"
Reviews.Content: For me, the most important factor about a shirt-pocket camera is that it actually fit into a shirt pocket.  I've carried such cameras (of ever-increasing sophistication) for 20+ years.  The Panasonic/Lumix ZS20 does so much more than fit in a shirt pocket that I was astonished.I bought it to replace a Canon shirt-pocket camera I'd had for only a few months because this gave me greater creative control.  Not the kind of control I have with my DSLR, but far more than on other shirt-pocket cameras I'd had.  I use it in Av mode most of the time, set to f/3.5.  Tv works fine when I need to stop motion.I bought this relatively inexpensive camera without even noticing that it was also a video camera, of sorts.  Boy was I pleasantly surprised when I discovered I could take videos with it, and the videos turned out to be much better than I had expected when played back on my computer.I've been mostly using Canon shirt-pocket cameras for many years; but their cameras in this class, powerful & professional as they are, have been growing in size and most of them no longer fit into a shirt pocket.  I'll be giving Panasonic/Lumix cameras a higher priority in my purchase decisions in the future.If you need a carry-all-the-time camera, I strongly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: CLW
Reviews.Content: Would be giving it 5 stars, but have a shadow in bottom left corner when doing close ups with a flash. Haven't called customer service yet. Hoping it not design problem of flash placement with respect to telescoping nozzle. Takes great automatic pictures and I like the manual options when want to customize. Will do better review when I get the shadow problem resolved.I gave the case I bought with it away (too small). Probably better to buy at local store since the measurements are subjective. Since the batteries are rechargeable only, you will probably want to carry the charger with it (else buy an backup battery) and ththat also takes a larger case (trial and error) - got great fitting case at walmart for $15.Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Automated Lens Cover Started To Stick After 20 Days
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Papal Historian"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. It is awesome. But yesterday, just 20 days into using it, a Christmas present, the lens cover stopped fully retracting -- it would stick halfway, leaving just a slit exposed for the lens. Multiple recycling of the power fixed it the first time around, but it happened again the next time it was powered up.Think this is an anomaly in just this camera and that it is not a design or manufacturing fault. I own multiple Panasonics.Returned it today for a replacement. As ever doing so with Amazon was slick and painless. UPS just picked up the return.Just a heads up.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: JLM
Reviews.Content: Small but powerful, excellent quality pictures with a zoom that is superb. But I don't understand why the price changes depending on the color??!

Reviews.Title: Love the camera!
Reviews.Author: Navnit Mehta
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera! I would highly recommend this for a pocket camera. Excellent result and love the clarity of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: New camera
Reviews.Author: P. Longstalker "Woods walker"
Reviews.Content: Wooks well -- after you read the book.  Wanted a higher zoom than I had, this one has an excellent zoom.  I'm quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: OK, but not great, has some problems
Reviews.Author: eelight
Reviews.Content: I experienced two issues. First, the firmware update to v1.1 (for handheld night shots): I followed the instructions on the Panasonic website carefully, yet the update did not succeed. It said it would not work if the battery was not fully charged, so I charged it for 24 hours, still no luck. Secondly, the GPS failed to acquire satellites in more than 2 days of testing. I put the camera on a south-facing windowsill, with almost half of the sky visible, (although it WAS cloudy), again no luck.Pictures are ok, although low light shots show a lot of noise, as you would expect. But with the above problems, it is being returned. Thank you Amazon, for making returns easy (at least in US). Panasonic, you need to make your products less finicky.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: tarek
Reviews.Content: I love it and it works good and i got a many photos with it and the zoom is working very good and i use the gps its really a wonderful camera and got many future in it and recommend it  for every one

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Olga Gavronskaya
Reviews.Content: Excellent photos, great shots even with the lack of light. Great quality in a small box, very nifty and handy device.

Reviews.Title: This really impressed my wife.
Reviews.Author: Michael Ocenosak "mocen"
Reviews.Content: I was concerned that the Cannon A600 series or the Nikon Coolpix was a much better option or value.  This camera did impress me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Sherried
Reviews.Content: My husband is very satisfied with this lightweight, affordable camera. It has a great zoom lens and excellent picture quality!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: R. Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as I wanted a pocket camera with a good zoom lens.  I won't go into too many specifics as other reviews did a great job describing the camera.This camera turns on fast, and I can start taking a picture within a few secs. My older camera, and my camera on my phone seems to take forever.  I bought a 32gb SD card, and the camera accepted it with no problems.  Pictures were excellent, including taking videos with the camera.  It feels great in the hand and seem to be of excellent quality.  If you are looking for a point and shoot camera, that takes good pictures and video, and you want it to turn on fast, this is the camera to get.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly for travel, easy to carry on the go and I'm pleased with how it performs.  Does a great job in taking pics outdoors in daylight, but inside pics not as good in dim settings. Pictures turn out darker than I'd like and if there's any movement either in camera or objects pictures are a little blurry at times w/auto setting point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: A really good camera
Reviews.Author: J.J. Hopscotch
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. It is outstanding and very user friendly. I am not especially technical but I had this set up and working in minutes after charging the battery. The GPS feature is remarkable. I'll have to get one for myself before my next trip.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20
Reviews.Author: Jerome Stein "JES"
Reviews.Content: I love this travel camera.  There is a lot offered in this small package.  I will be using this when I travel instead of the Digital Single Lens Refelx camera that I have been using.  The zoom is better than I expected and the pictures from this are wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Margaree Johnson
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Lumix. I had been an SLR person in the past, but had been taking very few pictures in the recent past. (I got tired of lugging my camera with the long lens around). I decided to purchase a small digital camera, and after researching different brands, decided to purchase the Panasonic Lumix ZS20. The still pics and videos are great! I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent acmera at a very good price
Reviews.Author: SimonHalcon
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for almost a month now and I can say pictureas are lovely and all features work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome zoom ability in a compact camera
Reviews.Author: Pru "Pru"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my old Lumix and love it. This unit is smaller and lighter with a larger zoom. The dial controls aren't as intuitive as the older version and I have a hard time getting the GPS setting accurate, but I love the pictures I take with this camera. Video is also really good. The price point is great too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent as expected
Reviews.Author: pnkwilmot
Reviews.Content: This is my third Panasonic point and shoot. This one is the best yet. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high quality compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20
Reviews.Author: Olinka "love to read"
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the money. Pictures are clear, great zoom, small to fit any bag or pocket when traveling. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very good for me
Reviews.Author: Giorgio Donati
Reviews.Content: I like this camera for his large zoom and high quality lens. It a small camera easy to carry and light. Perfect for holidays, family and babiesl

Reviews.Title: Small and compact and feature rich
Reviews.Author: jonathan commanday
Reviews.Content: Tiny little camera that does it all, and it takes very good pictures and excellent video with good sound.If you want a great compact camera this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good, except .....
Reviews.Author: scp2006
Reviews.Content: Pictures were crisp & bright, pixel for pixel super good camera, Videos were outstanding as well. Only problem I ran into was when the pictures were taken in night time under ambient light conditions (like standard living room lighting), there was a wierd shadow/silhoutte that just wont go away. Pictures taken using flash in pitch dark are actually much better than standard evening light conditions. I tried changing memory cards, tried to look up if anyone else had this issues (which I could not find any, may be my search was not good enough). In the end I simply had not enough time to mess and returned the product. But, those picture with shadow are awful, that crazy line shadow contouring the bodies of people in the image..

Reviews.Title: Best all-around camera I have ever purchased that fits in your shirt pocket!
Reviews.Author: Joe Z. "CYBERKYRGZ"
Reviews.Content: Likes: zoom, picture quality, movie mode and GPS taggingDislikes: none at this time.  Owned it for 2 months, took great pics at the grand ole opry, very impressive camera!

Reviews.Title: Very versatile camera
Reviews.Author: David N
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a cruise with us.  I wanted something that had a long telephoto and multi-features but could be easily carried in a camera case on my belt.  I am pleased with the features and still learning all of them.  The night photo feature and the HDR capability produced some really good pictures that I don't think I could have achieved with my previous camera.  I did manage to lock it up when I first got it by playing with the mapping feature.  The GPS was not on and the camera totally froze when I was moving the map display.  Had to remove the battery to reset it.  I still give it five stars because that hasn't happened again and I've really put it through its paces the past few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great camera--glad I bought it
Reviews.Author: weedpatch
Reviews.Content: I loved my Casio 10x but this camera (for the same price as my old Casio's) is a superb value.Huge zoom with no loss in focus! Unlike the Casio, the video button is not in the way (with the casio, i was constantly hitting the video button with my fingers). Haven't played with manual settings yet, but am glad the camera has them.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, price is great and it performance as expected
Reviews.Author: Walter Spinelli
Reviews.Content: Good quality, price is great and it performance as expected, you should have another camera battery because it duration is not good enough.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures, but is VERY fragile
Reviews.Author: Marcin K. Porwit
Reviews.Content: On the plus side, this camera takes very good pictures, even in low-light conditions or with the zoom fully extended. The GPS tagging is super-convenient. When you're on a long trip, as this camera is, that's invaluable.However, this is now the second Lumix (the previous was  a ZS16) that has died in very short order. The first one lasted about 3 months, and then developed problems with lots of dust on the sensor, as well as problems reliably extending and retracting the lens. This replacement held up for maybe a month and a half, and now manifests the same issues. It will be going back to Panasonic for warranty repair, but I don't think it will be replaced by yet another Lumix super zoom.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described!!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Thomas Aminikharrazi
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described!!!! As you read the product info, you always wonder if products like this are what they describe them as.  This one is.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic LUMIX a great buy
Reviews.Author: Mariel
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Panasonic LUMIX ZS20. I had an earlier model of LUmix 4 years old that wore out. This model is much better with so many features for the money that I highly recommend it. Seems to hold a batttery charge longer too. One store I consulted said you videotape as long as 2 hours with an SD memory card inserted those this is not mentioned in Panasonic features. This cinched the deal to get a digital camera and video camera all in one. GLAD I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Doug Lawson "Toolman"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Panasonic Lumix camera. I had a ZS3 first and now have the ZS20.  This is a great camera and has many manual features that the more expensive cameras have.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Cameras take great pictures and are so easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Renee Clark
Reviews.Content: This is the 5th Panasonic my family has purchased, each time upgrading to more advance photography needs.  This camera is excellent for brilliant, vivid colors, zoom from far away, and close ups.  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: It is awesome
Reviews.Author: VADLAMANI SRIKANTH
Reviews.Content: Very good, I took videos and pictures quality was awesome. It has long battery life recommend it for either novice or professionals photographers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, easy to use, if you are a techie.
Reviews.Author: F. Herrera "Wopox"
Reviews.Content: It{s a very nice camera, excellent features, a very smart camera, good pictures, good video recording, good sound. I'm still not convinced about the gps feature, i think it's a little bit complicated for what you get on the gps.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera
Reviews.Author: Jadeoliveira
Reviews.Content: I have used the camera for a few days and I am impressed with it.It is not 5 starts because focus when using zoom is not as good as expected but in general this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Tim Hjellum "Timion"
Reviews.Content: I spent so much time researching cameras and I finally decided on this one. The primary reason I selected this camera is because of the zoom and megapixels. I cannot put to words how much I love this camera! Hands down this camera rocks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: CHUpstateNY
Reviews.Content: I gave 5 stars because I feel that this camera is excellent for its cost.  I have tried out/owned many camera that are around the same price with no where near the photo quality.  Now, this is not an SLR but is its settings and quality are very good.The camera is easy to use and easy to handle, in my opinion.  The battery life seems great (have had it for ~2 months) as I have only charged it 2 times, which is great since I have been taking MANY pictures of my children.

Reviews.Title: An absolutely superb camera!
Reviews.Author: Charles West
Reviews.Content: I've been shooting with an earlier model for more than a year! This latest model is even better in many ways. A marked increase in telephoto capability, an improved menu format and more automatic features, make this Lumix model a joy to take pictures with!

Reviews.Title: Love my Lumix!
Reviews.Author: Ann Taber
Reviews.Content: This camera is of my dreams, small, with a 20x zoom for a safari trip.  I have taken good pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah Carroll
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it. It's small and the photos are clear and we love the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ovieda Estrada "Insight Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I was going on vacatoin so it was a risk to buy a new camera right before going but I like Panasonic products and this camera had all the features on my big Panasonic that was too big to pack.  It took great pictures!  I took every kind, panorama, night, day, through the glass while in a helicopter.  Everything came out great.  And who doesn't like a cute red camera?  It makes me happy every time I look at it when I saw how great my pictures turned out.  The vacation was a vacation of a lifetime and with this camera I have the pictures to prove it.

Reviews.Title: Love the Panasonic Lumix cameras
Reviews.Author: Harleyjan99
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Panasonic Lumix camera.  I have two earlier versions.  I bought this one because of the increase in the zoom (20x).  I carry it with me all the time.  It takes great photos - people, scenery, sports/action shots.  Its easy to use.  I haven't tried the GPS capabilities yet.  I have a fancy DSLR but use the Lumix on many trips when I don't want to haul around a larger/heavier camera.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY PANASONIC ZS2O!
Reviews.Author: Lola Potosi-Males
Reviews.Content: I GOT THE SAME CAMERA 4 YEARS AGO,  EXCELLENT NICE LOOKING CAMERA THAT EVERYBODY LIKES IT! I AM BUYING AN OTHER ONE FOR MY NIECE AND I AM PLANING TO GET ONE MORE IN THE FUTURE FOR MY SISTER THE SAME BRAND.AMAZON I LOVE IT IT MAKES SO EASY TO BUY ON LINE, SECURE AND CONVENIENT!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20 Camera
Reviews.Author: Sherman Acord
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures, and has all the features I expected.  The reason I didn't give it 5 stars, is, I don't like the touch screen. And, some of the screen icons are a bother.  If I had it to do over, I would have got the ZS19, which would have worked better for me.  There is nothing wrong with the ZS20, just not what I like.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Joyce Davidson
Reviews.Content: It surpassed my expectations.  I just returned from a trip to Jamaica - scenery, water sports, night shots, portraits and every photo was great.

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne H. Weissman
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with how well this camera works, especially the stabilization with 20X zoom.  Although it is a very small camera, it takes pictures like a much bigger camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: tinakarenina
Reviews.Content: The zoom on this camera is insane, and it's a totally reasonable price for what you get. The screen is a touchscreen, which seemed a bit unnecessary, but it's a nice perk. Overall, it's a nice point and shoot with 20x optical zoom.

Reviews.Title: A gift, waiting to see.
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Had very good reports on camera sites.  My daugter wanted a "good camera" with a long zoom, rapid fire, easy to use.  Good reviews, good price, came very quickly.  I do have Prime.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Malia Mason
Reviews.Content: I bought the predecessor to this camera in 2008 and it still works like a champ. This is the update and it takes great photos. It's definitely not a replacement for an SLR/DSLR, but I believe it takes comparable photos. The photo features are fairly useful, but i've found the auto setting is usually best. I took this camera with me hiking and backpacking and the battery lasted very well. I am very satisfied with my purchase and i hope it lasts as long as my other one (which still works perfectly!).

Reviews.Title: SUMMERY
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Edwards
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERIA WAS PURCHASED BY MY HUSBAND. I KNOW HE SEEMS TO LOVE THE CONVIENCE OF HAVING A SMALL CAMERA THAT HE CAN PUT IN HIS POCKET AND TAKES GOOD PICTURES, TOO.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Abigail R. Marlow
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great size. I'd definitely recommend it for someone who just needs an everyday camera. It takes good pictures, and my whole family uses it!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Young
Reviews.Content: I love the zoom, and the shutter button response time is perfect. The features are far superior to other brands I've looked at.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: dm8711
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter to replace her older Kodak 5mp. WOW....This takes great photos. It is sturdy, easy to use, and has a multitude of features. I would definitely recommend this camera !

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: D. R. Ransdell
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in part because I was persuaded by Amazon's pictures showing the zoom range. The camera does indeed have an impressive scope. I have a more sophisticated Panasonic Lumix, but it's too heavy to carry around on an everyday basis. This camera is so handy that I won't miss out on those unexpected treasures--shots I couldn't have anticipated before leaving home.

Reviews.Title: I'm no expert, but...
Reviews.Author: D. Cocup
Reviews.Content: Haven't had this much fun for years! Goodbye Canon DSLR, hello something I can carry easily in my pocket! It's more fiddley in some ways and trying to find the thing you want to focus on at x20 can be a problem, but really for someone who just wants to take holiday type photos that are that bit better than most other people's, this little camera is ideal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: harrobwil
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend the Lumix ZS20 camera. I purchased this camera after first buying and returning the Nikon Coolpix S8200. See my review of the Coolpix S8200. I then purchased (from Amazon) a Lumix ZS20, now I get wonderful pictures (better than I expected in low light), wonderful zoom action, wonderful HD video (including zooming while video recording).

Reviews.Title: Exceded expectations
Reviews.Author: Arlana Stewart
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after my very old one died.  I did research before decideing on this camera because it got such high marks in the "point and shoot" catagory.  It's in a high end price range (for this catagory) but after checking out different vendors on Amazon and local prices I got a good deal on this one.I have only had the camera for about 6 weeks. The first time I used it was on our vacation to Costa Rica. I was amazed at how good this camera is.  The zoom lens is one of the best features on this camera.  I got some pictures I really didn't think I could get because the subject was so far away but this camera got them up close.  The size (compact) and weight (light), despite it's large lens, was great because I had to carry it around the rain forest. If there is a down side to this camera it's that it has so many features I still haven't figured them all out. The wheel on top which you turn to get the feature you want to use is easy but I find I'm having a hard time remembering them all.  The camera uses letters instead of icons so you have to remember what they're for.  That's the only downside I've found so far. If you want something that will give you a bit more in a camera that's just point and shoot I'd highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mary J. Unger "hammerdown"
Reviews.Content: One of the best purchases I made in a while.  Takes great pictures and is easy to carry around...Just what I needed to complete my pictures taking collection of cameras.....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Pure Mood
Reviews.Content: HiI was looking for a pocket camera and this has proven to be one of the best for the money.I Tried the Fuji and there was no comparison. You will not regret buying this camera. I showed the shots of some eagles which were about 75 yards from me and he ordered one for Christmas from his wife.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "TonyBR"
Reviews.Content: I'm in love with this cam so far.The zoom is great, the photo quality its excelent not to mention allother options you can have with this Panasonic cam!I did like the panorama pics results too!I have it for so little time yet but I'm sure will discover a lot more!A MUST HAVE if you're looking for the perfect point & shoot cam

Reviews.Title: Excellent zoom & easy-to-use features!!
Reviews.Author: Abo of Park Slope
Reviews.Content: So far, I am very pleased with the features of the ZS20, particularly the wide range of the zoom lens.  The touch-screen feature is handy for viewing photos but requires much more pressure to use than other touch-screen equipment.  Excellent choice for a compact camera!

Reviews.Title: always panasonic
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Yang "Azn boy"
Reviews.Content: the HD video on this is great, so is the optical zoom, a rare feature in small cameras. if you are looking for an all around sturdy camera with fine photographic qualities, this is a +1.i'm a loyal panasonic customer and so long as they make cameras like the lumix i will always be.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: CMS
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, unbelievable zoom and quality photos!  Fantastic camera for the price- glad I chose this one over the many I looked at.

Reviews.Title: Tiny camera with a big lens!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera and own a few small compact point & shoot cameras. I put it to work with close ups and far away shots, the night shots were good and the camera starts up fast. What a wonderful Christmas gift or just because gift for someone looking for a high tech camera with all the bells & whistles  which doesn't require a rocket scientist to operate it or have to spend a lot of money purchasing it. I wanted a quick super zoom camera to take wonderful pictures and this one does!!! Go on line and do the research.P.S if you take a lot of pictures I would suggest getting a memory card too.TimA photo developer

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, with great results
Reviews.Author: Allison S. Joe
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product looking for a camera that was easy to operate, but had the quality and flexibility of a DSLR camera.  Picture quality is fantastic, with lots of options and preset settings for a variety of settings.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Tine
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation to the Grand Canyon and did not want to haul my big SLR Cannon.  This product felt right in my hand, not to small,and not to big.  I did read a review about purchasing a bag to protect the lens, and I agree the lens cover is VERY easily shifted, and pushed out of its tracks.  I liked the panoramic option and was able to get some really clear, quality photos w/ this option.  This camera can be set for simplicity or for more artist work if desired.  So far so good.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Carl Bergman "jaclyn bergman"
Reviews.Content: problems with getting a clear picture when full zoom is used.  takes longer than I thought to review pic after shooting.

Reviews.Title: Good deal if you need a compact zoom
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera up to supplement my SLR when using SLR is not practical. The zoom is pretty good for the size of the package, and picture quality is acceptable. Panorama feature works very well - it even managed to work somewhat during a choppy helicopter flight in a moderate wind - no small task. Not sure what the 3D feature does, haven't used.Pros: Price, touch screen, zoom, lens, PASM mode, picture quality, fast start-up (on/off)Cons: buttons feel a tad flimsy (but not bad overall), f stop is a bit high, which impacts lower light photos, somewhat confusing interface.

Reviews.Title: Flexible camera
Reviews.Author: Mike Brosnan
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased to be used to take close-up and/or macro photos for eBay.  It is one of the best inexpensive units out there.  The camera is comfortable to hold, controls are reasonably intuitive, and it has good optical zoom and GPS.  We looked at Nikon, Canon, Panasonic, and other manufacturers, and this one was the best mix of features and low price.  We have not used it to make videos, but all the other features work well. The only disappointing factor was that it shipped without a memory card--considering the current prices on them, it would have been nicer to have a small card in the box. As with most new electronic items, the manual that was included was minimal.

Reviews.Title: Lumix point and shoots are still the best..
Reviews.Author: tim beno
Reviews.Content: this camera was everything advertised, and for the price, you could not beat it with all its features. I have had Lumix cameras for years, with usually great results, and it is the usual ease of use...

Reviews.Title: Met expectations
Reviews.Author: John H. Adams "Jussi"
Reviews.Content: The camera has more than enough features to satisfy all but the most discerning  user. Most users will probably not use but a few of the features. It takes a bit of time to study the users manual but the camera can be used  almost intuitively. It is verypocket friendly and is hardly noticeable. It may be overkill for the average user but will certainly meet the needs of most people.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Was going to by the Leica counter part.  I was not able to find any differences.  I use this camera almost every day to take pictures of my horses.  It works well in the barn which is an adverse lighting condition.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Pmbrdk
Reviews.Content: this is my second panasonic lumix digital camera. It makes good pictures, either in automatic (iA) mode or in 'manual. and the picture quality is great!!

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: Takes super clear super fast pictures! No more missing great picture opportunities because of a slow camera. Zoom is incredible. Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Impressive gadget, excellent value for the money
Reviews.Author: Cs
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before I set out on a road trip and I must say I'm impressed with the results. You get considerable ease of use (that also includes the touchscreen) along with some very impressive features (again, that includes the touchscreen), all that in a rugged but very compact shell.The camera starts up and gets ready to capture images very quickly, although not if it's left in playback mode when turning it off, which happened to me a few times because of the silly rocker switch. I'm satisfied with the quality of the photos and motion picture quality is just astounding, complemented by awesome image stabilization - works great when shooting hand-held videos.I read complaints about battery life but I never had any problems in this respect - although you'll want to leave it on the charger overnight if you do extensive shooting during the day.I was frustrated by the GPS clock sync consistently setting itself one hour behind on the West Coast. I suppose that was because I had no way of uploading the maps and GPS assist data that come with the camera back then, which messed up the DST setting. Then again, the number of POI's it can identify by GPS even without maps uploaded is fascinating.

Reviews.Title: Excellent so far.
Reviews.Author: Oscar B
Reviews.Content: I was planning to buy a Panasonic FZ-150 for about $600; but then I realizedit was too much money to spend given that I do not take photos so often.So I decided to go for something cheaper but without losing too much quality.In this regard, this camera was the perfect choice.I even think this camera can be priced for more than what I paid.So for the price I got it it is just perfect; HD Video, excellent zoom,great photo quality overall.If you are looking for a responsive touch screen, then this camera is not for you.Actually there are few thing you can do with the touch screen; I do not complain about thisbecause they didn't advertise the touch screen capability as a reason to buy; in other wordsI got what I expected.Loving it and sharing my photos on Facebook already :)

Reviews.Title: My new Lumix from Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: 1whoknew
Reviews.Content: I have had this new camera for a few short weeks.I have filmed a few short videos and I absolutely love the zoom in and out while filming. The choices with all the gadgets are starting to make sense and the gps is interesting too.I put a strap that goes around my neck on it because the little wrist one that came with the camera just didn't feel reliable enough.When I download the pictures to my laptop, they are real clear and don't need much fixing.I look forward to having lots of fun with this gem!

Reviews.Title: Liminix camera
Reviews.Author: Tom13
Reviews.Content: Great as point and shoot, as many pixels as most need, Leica lens, easy point and shoot quick menu and many special options with a very reasonable price. I added a 32gb memory and get I get 1 hour video. Also as an old guy the anti shake software is a lifesaver for focus.Tom13

Reviews.Title: To date, a very good camera
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: After shopping and researching digital cameras for nearly two months before purchasing, I am pleased with the quality and performance of this camera, to date, although opportunities for use have been few. I was pleased with the first Panasonic of many years ago and decided to purchase another one.This camera is with me 90% of the time as it fits well within a small padded camera case in my handbag. I like the idea of not having to carry numerous batteries with me when planning to take a lot of photos, I did purchase an extra battery and other accessories with with to charge the battery and still use the camera."IA" - Intelligent Auto has been used for most of photo taking but hope to learn more about the manual features as well as all the other options soon.  Love the scene setting options and have been experimenting with the panoramic setting also. Have been able to find instructional videos on the Net for this camera which is also a plus and hope to learn more with "hands on" time.  Colors with good lighting is excellent!  Have been very pleased with photos of people as flesh tones are not washed out.I am not a professional, but do understand some of the various aspects of picture taking.  With digital technology, there are many options of which to photograph. After the holidays, it will be easier to share a more detailed review as the camera will be utilized more.Will update my review at a later date after more camera use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: HCW "avidre"
Reviews.Content: Replaced a Canon model that the Zoom lens got stuck and broke.  Had it for 2-Months and this Panasonic works much smoother than the Canon and has a slimmer profile.  Still trying to get used to the different picture settings to determine what works best in which conditions.  Overall a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Lumix ZS20 from Amazon
Reviews.Author: James Wise
Reviews.Content: This pocket camera has terrific resolution, light sensitivity, versatility, and image stabilization.  Unlike a big heavy SLR, it will be there when the picture opportunity comes.

Reviews.Title: Amazed by all the functions in this compact camera.
Reviews.Author: H. Zhang "hz"
Reviews.Content: I was increasingly taking panoramas with my PowerShot SD750 which I loved, and I had to stitch the panorama shots on a computer one at a time.  I decided to find a camera with in-camera photo stitching.  As far as I know, there are only two brands with it - Panasonic, Sony.  I was also increasingly geotagging my photos manually. I thought it would be nice for a camera to do it for me like the one of my smartphone.  I also wanted to have high optical zoom.  With all these requirements, there are not many choices among pocket size cameras. I picked Lumix ZS20 eventually.  Jeff Keller's comprehensive review on dpreview helped a lot.I have taken over 1000 photos indoors and outdoors, on beaches, in mountains.  I am sure now that I made a right decision to choose this camera.The panorama function (i.e. in-camera photo stitching for panorama) works well.  It may fail occasionally for understandable reasons which include moving objects, drastic variation of brightness from one part to another part of the panoramic scene.The GPS works well too.  It takes a few minutes for it to acquire satellite signals. This is probably normal.  However, I think that smartphones seem to be quicker in positioning, so there may be room for GPS function improvement.  Because of this, I had to keep GPS on all the time hence draining the battery.The Optical Image Stabilizer works very well.  I get clear images even with high zoom.I love the sunset mode.  I used it for a sunrise.  It was my first time to get decent sunrise pictures with a P&S; camera.The battery ran out after about 210 photos in 6 hours on a bike trip.  I certainly need a backup battery or portable battery charger because I tend to have long trips.The touchscreen is not very responsive.  Since most touch actions can be replaced with button clicking, so it is not a big deal. I rarely use it.I am amazed by what one can get from a compact camera like this nowadays.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: BLU
Reviews.Content: I tried 4 Cameras with 16 power to 26 power lens, but none of thier stabilizers would give me clear pictures without a tripod. The Panasonic ZS20 is the first I've used that has the combination of a very fast lens and a good stabilizer. Excellent pictures. The fuzzy pictures are gone!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for everyday use.
Reviews.Author: Pepe
Reviews.Content: Three years ago I moved away from Canon looking for a camera that could combine photo and decent video. That's how I got the Panasonic ZS3, with which I've been quite happy all these time, however I've always missed the manual controls. That is the reason because I decided to upgrade recently to the ZS20. I have now used the camera for two months for different events and I'm ready to give some comments:PHOTO QUALITY: I was in general happy with the ZS3 in outdoor shooting, however I had two usual issues in low light and indoors situations. Both have been addressed in the ZS20 and have been improved. The first one was the high levels of noise in high ISO in the ZS3 (e.g. when you shoot at night or indoors with flash); in the ZS20 the noise levels have been noticeably reduced (although it might still be found some in very high ISO, like 1000 or 1600, but the outcome is not so terrible as in the ZS3). The second one was the flash, which was not very powerful in the ZS3. Initially the ZS20 seems to have the same issue when you use the automatic settings, however, this can be "tweaked" by using the manual shutter (setting it at a value of 1/13 will make scene and background to look more natural with flash, while avoiding subjects to be blurry). The manual controls come also very handy for other indoors situations that the ZS3 didn't handle properly (e.g. getting a decent photo of a stained glass window in a cathedral was a hard task, if not impossible, with the automatic settings of the ZS3. Problem solved with the manual controls in the ZS20).VIDEO QUALITY: great in general. As in the ZS3, the optical zoom can be used while filming (three years ago this was the feature that made me move away from Canon). In the ZS20 model, the video is true 60fps, which makes panning movements incredibly smooth (officially the ZS3 was also 60fps, but actually it was just double 30fps, and this could be noticed in fast panning). Video image is amazingly crisp, and colors look great. The stabilizer looks also better than in the ZS3; I got less shaky filming with the ZS20. The only minor issue that I found is filming in low light. The ZS20 does not do as nice in low light as the ZS3 and recordings look a bit darker (that's why I don't give five stars to this model). This low light issue however, can be solved a little bit by setting the camera for a low light mode in the "Image setting" (e.g. "night shot") and later raising the level controls in the video editing software.In sum, a great camera that has manual features and a long zoom, as in bigger and more expensive models, but that is more affordable and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Maksym
Reviews.Content: The lenses comes from Leica (German made cameras) that cost more then 3 times as much as this Panasonic! But the picture quality is almost identical. I love my Panasonic it captures great pictures in sunlight to dark environments. In fact i am very impressed with how great this camera performs at low light, It comes with tons of manual setting options that can be overwhelming at first. Working with it for a while it becomes pretty easy to understand. 20X zoom is out of this world really good for point and shoot, something that can fit in your pocket. I have done many beach pictures of ships out in the sea, i am surprised every time with how capable the zoom is to pick up small details. To conclude its a must have for someone who needs great zoom under $250.

Reviews.Title: Small but loaded
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my Samsung had problems. (had them the whole 3 years) so I didn't want to replace it with another. I was checking out all the cameras, both on Amazon and in the stores to see what I thought. I saw the ZS 10 on Amazon and was going to purchase that one, but then I saw the ZS20 and read the information for it. I was impressed with all that it offered, so much more then the predecessors. It came right away and I downloaded the manual from the CD and am still going through it. There is a lot to this  little camera. I have taken some photos with it, and movies too. The photos are great,very clear even taking something in motion. (I photographed my dog)  and the video too. I got the GPS to work also. It has so many features its going to be so much fun to use when I get it all down. The only problem I have, is that the you have to charge the battery in the camera. Either by computer or regular wall plug. I ordered a regular charger and another battery so I can still use the camera while a battery is charging. Its a great by, and well worth the time it is taking to learn about all of the great features. I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: B. Haggerty
Reviews.Content: Still playing with all the features of this camera as I am not used to having so many options.  I am a point and shoot person who doesn't look for advanced settings, exposure, etc.  But I will now, with the ease of using features on this camera.  Besides those, the zoom is AWESOME which was the main buying point for the camera.  Met our expectations and beyond.  As well, the color and crispness of this camera is on point.  Haven't printed any pics from it yet, but pictures are stunning on the computer.  Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great little Point & Shoot with a long zoom
Reviews.Author: TalksWithOwls
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera as a replacement to a water-logged ZS7.  LOVE the extra zoom on this little baby!  I wanted a camera that would be able to use the same battery as my prior camera (over $150 invested in extra batteries - so this was the one).  I have been very happy with my other Panasonic cameras, so I felt comfortable buying this one.I like being able to choose whether to use the dials or the touchscreen to set the various functions.The HDR effect on this one is pretty cool.  I have Photomatix software, but this camera's built in function does a surprisingly great job by itself.Photos are a little soft, and need some tweaking, but that's pretty much expected in a point & shoot.  I really enjoy having this camera with me at all times, it does fit into my purse, so it's there when my big camera is at home.Only thing I'm not thrilled with is the GPS feature.  I have not tried to update it yet, but so far it doesn't work as well as the GPS on my old ZS7.  I live in a rural area, and it can not even find the names for several of the towns.  One of these days I'll take some time to look into that.Good camera, Great price, portability & a super-zoom, some manual settings... Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: mpaqdigital
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing little camera. Takes excellent photos in both high and low light conditions. If you are looking for a great point and shoot this is the one. Only complaint I have is that the GPS can take a while to update sometimes so about 20% of my photos end up being tagged in the wrong location. But that's still 80% I don't have to tag in iPhoto!

Reviews.Title: review of luminex zs20
Reviews.Author: froznfinn
Reviews.Content: Originally , I was looking at it's bigger brother the fx150..but decided to go with a compact camera. I researchedthis camera extensively and found it to have features i liked.. I'm full aware that the picture quality is not onpar with many slr cameras.But i haven't been disappointed yet. Youtube was helpful to get me aquainted with this camera..I found out that i could get just about any picture I wanted with a little patience. I've taken long zoom pictures of wildlife in a kayak..without the use of a tripod ..and not a very stable situation and came away with closeup pictures of blue herons and loons etc.in fine detail. I took advantage of all of it's features to take shots that I wasn't able to take with some of my more expensive past cameras. So I'm very pleased with this camera .I've taken some nice portrait photos, fall scenery (full of color) and pet photo's with great results.

Reviews.Title: Great for Video!
Reviews.Author: HuntersPad
Reviews.Content: This Camera is GREAT I mean GREAT for 1080p Video its awesome! but pictures need improvement. The pictures come out VERY soft compared to my old canon

Reviews.Title: Best little camera I ever had.
Reviews.Author: chamco
Reviews.Content: This is my second Lumix, this one has more bells and whistles.Love this light weight pocket size.Super pictures, better than my larger cameras.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Edna
Reviews.Content: I searched for a good, portable camera for about 6 months.  This one fit the bill for me.  It has fantastic resolution, is easy to use, and is at a good price point.  I have a Canon Rebel T1, and I prefer shooting with this.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS20
Reviews.Author: Pinatubo
Reviews.Content: Not an expert, but it's a good camera.  Great images, great zoom, great technical reviews from "expert" sites  -- see Photographyblog.com for best one I found.  One small nit -- battery does not last all that long.

Reviews.Title: Excellent digital camera
Reviews.Author: rod_mct
Reviews.Content: All as described and EXCELLENT value for the great specification for this small but powerful bit of kit. Highly recommended to buy

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera. Definite upgrade over previous models
Reviews.Author: Dentish
Reviews.Content: This ZS20 replaces previous ZS7 and ZS3 models.  The ZS7 flew off the car roof at 75mph; amazingly it worked when we retrieved it, but a new camera was in order.  The ZS20 was chosen because of great experience  with its predecessors. It is easy and intuitive to use.  This model extends the zoom to 20x, but this is a silly number. Unless you are on a tripod or similar platform, the human hand cannot hold it steady enough.  Picture quality is excellent and it is a definite step up from the ZS7.  I notice that the ability to focus on multiple targets is enhanced significantly.  Burst mode is fun, but not serious.  Intelligent auto is good for novices and the uninterested, but not nearly robust enough for regular use.  Low light performance is marginal, but this is a criticism of nearly all cameras I evaluated.  I do not care for the soft focus of the Canons.  I do not like the noise of the low end Nikons.  Fuji seems to have gone downhill lately, and their cameras are just not up to parr.  The Olympus was interesting, but it felt like a toy, so I gave it no serious consideration.  Hence the ZS20.  I am very happy with overall performance, which I note to be an obvious improvement over the other versions mentioned.  Complaints about battery life do not seem justified, and I think the battery life is good. Not outstanding, but good.  One EXCELLENT FEATURE I NEVER SEE MENTIONED IS THE ABILTY TO PRINT A DATE RIGHT ON THE PICTURE.  Serious photographers might cringe, but so what?  We have 40,000 pictures of the kids and family over the last 20 years.  During that time some cameras imprinted the date, and this has been tremendously helpful.  "Was that the fourth birthday or the fifth?"  "Which time were we at Disney? "  This is a seemingly unimportant feature, but one I was very pleasantly surprised to see. Overall this is an excellent camera for active use in many daily situations . Sure a DSLR is better, but you cannot lug one of those around in your pocket.  This little gem does what it is supposed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: This is great little camera.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures. The ease of use is very important to people like me because I am electronically challenged.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: A. Jain
Reviews.Content: This camera is really awesome especially for the price it is available. It is really slim for 20X zoom and very light in weight. So far had no prblem in battery life. Captures great images.

Reviews.Title: Good at first, now terrible.
Reviews.Author: terraman
Reviews.Content: Bought the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS20 camera from Amazon about a year ago.  At first it seemed okay overall, though I noticed a slight problem with oranges appearing yellow in pictures of sunsets. Then in July 2012 I went on a trip to the upper peninsula of Michigan where I took hundreds of pictures outdoors.  After a couple of hundred pictures a dark brown spot started to appear in the middle of the left side of every new image taken. Now there is a large blurry area in the upper right of every new image as well. So the camera has become useless. I am especially disappointed because I had a Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS1 for a couple of years and it always worked great. When I lost the ZS1 in May 2012 I thought I would try another Lumix, but I regret it now.  I cannot recommend the ZS20, though I would still recommend the ZS1. In the end the ZS20 cost about $1.50 for each of the approximately 200 good images I obtained while using it. From my experience, the ZS20 is a waste of time and of money!

Reviews.Title: Broke withing 6 months
Reviews.Author: Pa Hunter
Reviews.Content: The "lens cover" doors broke, rendering the camera unusable, within 6 months.  Takes OK pictures, but not as good as my old Sony.  The Sony has come out of retirement!

Reviews.Title: Love the video, hate the pictures
Reviews.Author: KJ "KJ"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying this camera last year. It seemed to offer everything I wanted....good picture and video quality. I was a bit disappointed with picture quality when I first got the camera, but kept trying different settings to improve things. I was bummed when I got home from a week long vacation to find that I had awesome videos and terrible pictures. Very soft, fuzzy photos in all modes. These were all outdoor, daylight shots, nothing tricky. The pictures were so disappointing. Looking once again for the perfect camera.This one let me down.

Reviews.Title: Camera broke down in less than a week.
Reviews.Author: carl schweizer
Reviews.Content: Perhaps I'm being harsh but the camera stopped working on day 6 of my 17 day trip to Ireland.  Time to send it back for repair.  Maybe I'll rate it better if no more problems arise.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: A. Nahrwold "Löölölölööl"
Reviews.Content: Taking snapshots works very well. Pictures in the dark are, as already described in several reviews, not the strength of this camera. But its ok. If you look at the price and look what you will get regarding features and picture quality, it is marvelous.What I really don't like at this Camera is the Casing and the used material. Everything seems to be a little bit trashy: the button make noises, switching from the photo view to the camera mode takes fairly.All in all: you get what you pay. So, I really like my new camera and all the drawbacks are compensated by the good picture quality, the speed to take a picture. and the tremendous zoom.

Reviews.Title: $57 Premium for Red Camera
Reviews.Author: Joy Lowry
Reviews.Content: In my email today, I see this RED camera has a $57 dollar premium over the identical BLACK camera. Nice camera but I just don't see the logic.

Reviews.Title: What a disappointment!
Reviews.Author: Patricia P. Tucker
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time looking for a camera with a good zoom capability for my trip to the U.K.  I knew there would be lots of photos I would have to take from a distance, and I wanted a clear result.  I also needed a camera that would allow me to take clear pictures with no flash, since we would be in many historical castles, museums, etc.  Long story short- the FIRST DAY of the trip we go to the Tower of London, I turn on camera to zoom in on a shoot, and it freezes on me! I can't get the camera to do anything. The zoom lenses is stuck in the out position, and the screen says there's an error. Totally useless camera on a 16 day trip of a lifetime!

Reviews.Title: Great slip in purse camera
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera with the best image stabilizer that works so well. Many settings to choose, lightweight and fits in purse easily. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher Avergas
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures, has a nice zoom and many other features.  It takes a little bit or time to load when you turn it on and you can't just hurry up and pick up the camera to take a picture.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Nenuko
Reviews.Content: It has a lot of features, modes, and takes very good pictures. The objetive is a little bit big compared with other cameras, but I guess it is due to the x20 zoom.

Reviews.Title: Good Photo and Portable
Reviews.Author: Alan Su
Reviews.Content: Pro:Good Photo Quality (Daylight)Small and PortableGood ZoomingCons:Video's slow to focusIndoor photo quality sometimes not good

Reviews.Title: This is a "disposable" camera
Reviews.Author: Can we build it?  Yes we can!
Reviews.Content: I've owned three of these and all three have broken literally weeks after the one-year warranty expired, all for reasons related to the lens.  Panasonic refuses to honor the warranty, even though they know they have recurring issues with the lens and even though it's only 13 days outside the warranty period.  The camera takes great photos and has many options for landscape, portrait, etc. photos, but bear in mind that it won't last very long.  I consider this a very expensive disposable camera.

Reviews.Title: Lumix ZS20 a good replacement for my ZS7 camera
Reviews.Author: Leo-C
Reviews.Content: I needed a back up to my DMC-ZS7 Lumix after many years of hard use.  Panasonic has been rated by Consumers Reports magazine as having one of the most reliable trouble fee cameras on the market then and now.  The ZS20 is just like the ZS7 but has a longer zoom 12X optical compared to 20X and more MP plus both have a wide angle lense (also needed in my work).  Leica has historically made some of the best lenses in the world ever since photography began.  I use the camera everday for work and it gets some pretty tough treatment and has never let me down.I take shots with manual settings for outdoor shots but switch it to full flash automatic settings for interior shots.  It just doesn't take a bad picture.  The battery/memory card door is constantly being opened and closed to change batteries and memory cards and has held up flawlessly over the years.  Keep up the good work Panasonic...quality really does matter.

Reviews.Title: The Panasonic Problem with ZS20 camera
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: When I received the Panasonic Lumix ZS20, I immediately learned that the enclosed DVD/CD which is supposed to include the advanced user's manual and the Fun Studio 8.2 application didn't include any of the items. I put the DVD (which has a cover on it identifying it as the Panasonic DVD/CD, actually in fact only had a DVD of a rap singer performing live.I figured mistakes happen. Obviously, the CD was stamped with the wrong label at the warehouse. I had no doubt Panasonic would fix the problem.I contacted Panasonic and explained the problem to them. They asked if I bought the camera through Amazon.com, which I did. I was instructed to get th order number from Amazon, inform them, and they would mail me the correct DVD. I did that. I sent them the order number.Panasonic then replied asking if the camera was a ZS20 or a ZS19. I hold told them initially that it was a ZS20, but I try to stay cool and contact them again with this information. I was assured that the correct DVD would be sent to me.Almost a week passed and there was no news. I contacted Panasonic again. Again, I had to tell them what the problem was, what kind of camera it was. They asked me to send them a copy of the sales receipt. I did. More time passed. No DVD.I called a final time and again I was asked to describe the problem, tell them what kind of camera it was, and what the order number was with Amazon.I finally gave up. I'll have to learn to operate the camera without the user's manual and I'll have to live without the DVD application. I still can't figure out a way to transfer the photos to my P.C.  I'm sure the user's manual would've helped. I'll keep trying to find a way.Panasonic's staff that handled this was obviously incompetent! They were no help at all and at times seemed annoyed that I got their number and called them on the phone.If I had this to do over, I would have bought the camera from another companyDON GRAHAM

Reviews.Title: vulnerable lens - to dust, to breaking.  great video capability though.  i'll miss that.
Reviews.Content: first mega zoom compact I've had, and was very impressed.  Video using zoom was also fabulous, and the ability to take still shots while zoomed and videoing also great!  unlike other compacts i've had, video was smooth and didn't noticably refocus while recording, and zoom was easily usable (again without noticable refocusing, or hearing the zoom motor - both of which were really annoying problems with a mid-high range canon compact I had before this).  photos look crisp, colors vibrant if lighting was right.why only three stars?- often washed out if there was too much light.- colors run "cool" - I prefer warmer colors and less contrast.  unless you are into tweaking camera settings, it's quite contrasty.  and deals with purple worse than any other compact camera I've had.- after I had the camera a few months (right after the Costco return period, of course), there was a speck of dust inside somewhere that was in the middle of every shot.  no cheap solution to that.- somehow that piece of dust dislodged itself (it was way in the lenses somewhere, not accessible to canned air or a brush), something at the bottom was wrong... bottom of what?  I don't know official terms.  basically, every photo (taken with the camera in normal/horizontal position) had a slanted black lower edge.  when I zoom, it's  a thicker edge.  something in there loosened out of place.  it seems like a fragile camera.I dropped it and the lens won't open.  sometimes it will if I jiggle it manually while as it tries to open when the camera is turned on.  so unreliable now and useless.  so I've bought a new camera (Fuji) with wonderful warm colors, generally much better photos, though less "sharp" looking as they aren't as contrasty as the Lumix.  fine with me.  but video is not as good as the lumix.so pick your battles or find a better overall camera.
